title: Deaths Registered by Area of Usual Residence, UK
summary: Presents data on death registrations in the United Kingdom by area of usual residence. The release contains a summary table providing key mortality measures (numbers and rates including age standardised mortality rates) for the United Kingdom and its constituent countries and a table providing numbers of deaths in England and Wales by age and sex.
metaDescription: Presents data on death registrations in the United Kingdom by area of usual residence. The release contains a summary table providing key mortality measures (numbers and rates including age standardised mortality rates) for the United Kingdom and its constituent countries and a table providing numbers of deaths in England and Wales by age and sex.
